Title: Bringer of Doom: A Carry/Tank Oriented Guide to Doom Bringer

ItemTooltips.platemail: Doom does not have a high armor rating, so an early platemail that will later be used to build a Shiva's Guard will reduce the amount of incoming damage.
ItemTooltips.ring_of_protection: Doom has low starting armor; this will serve to protect him and build a Ring of Basilius.
ItemTooltips.stout_shield: This will allow you to get an early start in the jungle (at level 3).  DO NOT BUILD THIS INTO A VANGUARD.  Rather, just spam your Scorched Earth when you need to regain your health.
ItemTooltips.gauntlets: This will serve to make you tankier, allowing you to stay in lane longer.
ItemTooltips.phase_boots: Phase boots solve your movement speed issue, as you will find yourself often chasing another hero.
ItemTooltips.hand_of_midas: An early Hand of Midas, coupled with Devour, allows you to easily amass a large amount of gold in a short timespan.  Farming up big items early is what makes Doom Bringer unique.
